繁體中文.title: 公路車尺寸建議工具

inseam: 腳跟到會陰的垂直距離
forearm: 手肘外上髁到橈骨莖突

繁體中文.stack_ok: ✅ 可使用 {value} 公分墊圈補足 Stack
繁體中文.stack_fail: ❌ 差距過大，建議更換車架
繁體中文.stack_too_high: ❌ 車架 stack 已過高，即使無墊圈也無法達到建議值 → 建議更換 stack 較低的車架
繁體中文.reach_fit: ✅ 可用 {required} mm 龍頭，與預設 {default} mm 差 {diff} mm → 預設可用
繁體中文.reach_unfit: ❌ 需 {required} mm 龍頭，預設為 {default} mm → 建議使用 {direction} 龍頭或換車架
繁體中文.shoulder_suggest: 建議把手寬度：{value} cm ±2 cm
繁體中文.support: ☕ 如果這工具有幫助，請我喝杯咖啡：

English.title: Road Bike Fit Recommendation Tool

inseam: Vertical distance from heel to crotch
trunk: Distance from C7 to iliac crest
forearm: From lateral epicondyle to radial styloid
thigh: From ASIS to top of patella
leg: From bottom of patella to medial malleolus

English.stack_ok: ✅ Use {value} cm spacer to match stack
English.stack_fail: ❌ Too much difference. Consider changing frame
English.stack_too_high: ❌ Frame stack is too high, even with 0 spacer → Consider a lower-stack frame
English.reach_fit: ✅ Suggested stem: {required} mm (default: {default} mm, diff: {diff} mm) → Default stem is acceptable
English.reach_unfit: ❌ Needs {required} mm stem (default: {default} mm) → Consider a {direction} stem or change frame size
English.support: ☕ If this tool helps you, consider buying me a coffee:
